alert.note: Alert for Washington (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 12 at 8:11PM CDT until April 12 at 8:45PM CDT by NWS Topeka
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 845 PM CDT FOR WASHINGTON COUNTY... At 811 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Hollenberg to 3 miles southwest of Palmer, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters reported quarter size hail near Clyde. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Washington, Hanover, Clifton, Linn, Greenleaf, Barnes, Morrowville, Palmer, Vining and Hollenberg. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
